title: Malls Reopen as Quarantine Rules Ease in Some Brazil States - Financial Post
description: (Bloomberg) — Shoppings malls have started to resume activities as some states and cities in Brazil relaxe quarantine rules. About 40 of more than 570 commercial centers are already back at w…
content:
(Bloomberg) — Shoppings malls have started to resume activities as some states and cities in Brazil relaxe quarantine rules. About 40 of more than 570 commercial centers are already back at work, according to local media.
The crisis created by pandemic has l… [+21852 chars]
